dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 813 IH: Putting Veterans Funding First Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Miller of Florida (for himself and Mr. Michaud) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for advance appropriations for certain discretionary accounts of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Putting Veterans Funding First Act of 2013.

section.header: Advance appropriations for certain discretionary accounts of the Department of Veterans Affairs

subsection.text: Section 117 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking medical care accounts of the Veterans Health Administration, Department of Veterans Affairs account and inserting accounts of the Department of Veterans Affairs account;
by adding at the end the following new paragraphs:

paragraph.text: Veterans Health Administration, Medical Research and Support.
Veterans Benefits Administration, Native American Veteran Housing Loan Program Account.
Departmental Administration, General Administration, General Operating Expenses.
Departmental Administration, General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration.
Departmental Administration, Office of the Inspector General.
Departmental Administration, Grants for Construction of State Extended Care Facilities.
Departmental Administration, Grants for Construction of Veterans Cemeteries.

subparagraph.text: in the subsection heading, by striking Medical care accounts and inserting Discretionary accounts; and

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by striking certain medical care accounts and inserting certain discretionary accounts.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to fiscal year 2016 and each subsequent fiscal year.
